events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your online store but would like to request a refund because it doesn't fit properly. Please help me with the return process.
The issue has been classified under the Refund category based on the customer's request concerning a return and refund.
A customer service agent from the Returns team has been assigned to handle this refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket. I'd be happy to assist you with the refund and return process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm that the jacket is in its original condition with tags attached?
Sure, my order number is 4521987. The jacket is unused and has all tags intact as it was never worn outside.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund once we receive the return package. I'll send you a prepaid return label via email today.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the prepaid label and look forward to returning the jacket as soon as I get it.
We have received the returned jacket in good condition and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that the refund has been received and if thereâ€™s anything else we can assist you with today.
Since your refund was successfully processed and no other issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for shopping with us!
